title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: A boy swallows a cursed talisman - the finger of a demon - and becomes cursed himself. He enters a shaman's school to be able to locate the demon's other body parts and thus exorcise himself.

title: Attack on Titan
description: After his hometown is destroyed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
description: An elf and her friends defeat a demon king in a great war. But the war is over, and the elf must search for a new way of life.

title: One Piece
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets off on an adventure with his pirate crew in hopes of finding the greatest treasure ever, known as the One Piece.

title: My Hero Academia
description: A superhero-admiring boy enrolls in a prestigious hero academy and learns what it really means to be a hero, after the strongest superhero grants him his own powers.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

title: Vinland Saga
description: Following a tragedy, Thorfinn embarks on a journey with the man responsible for it to take his life in a duel as a true and honorable warrior to pay homage.

title: One Punch Man
description: The story of Saitama, a hero that does it just for fun and can defeat his enemies with a single punch.

title: Death Note
description: An intelligent high school student goes on a secret crusade to eliminate criminals from the world after discovering a notebook capable of killing anyone whose name is written into it.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Two brothers search for a Philosopher's Stone after an attempt to revive their deceased mother goes awry and leaves them in damaged physical forms.

title: Hunter x Hunter
description: Gon Freecss aspires to become a Hunter, an exceptional being capable of greatness. With his friends and his potential, he seeks out his father, who left him when he was younger.

title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
description: The story of the Joestar family, who are possessed with intense psychic strength, and the adventures each member encounters throughout their lives.

title: Naruto: Shippuden
description: Naruto Uzumaki, is a loud, hyperactive, adolescent ninja who constantly searches for approval and recognition, as well as to become Hokage, who is acknowledged as the leader and strongest of all ninja in the village.

title: Bleach
description: High school student Ichigo Kurosaki, who has the ability to see ghosts, gains soul reaper powers from Rukia Kuchiki and sets out to save the world from Hollows.

title: Monster
description: Tenma, a brilliant neurosurgeon with a promising future, risks his career to save the life of a critically wounded young boy. The boy, now a charismatic young man, reappears 9 years later in the midst of a string of unusual serial murders.

title: Chainsaw Man
description: Following a betrayal, a young man left for dead is reborn as a powerful devil-human hybrid after merging with his pet devil and is soon enlisted into an organization dedicated to hunting devils.

title: Naruto
description: Naruto Uzumaki, a mischievous adolescent ninja, struggles as he searches for recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the village's leader and strongest ninja.

title: Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War
description: The peace is suddenly broken when warning sirens blare through the Soul Society. Residents are disappearing without a trace and nobody knows who's behind it.

title: Code Geass
description: After being given a mysterious power to control others, an outcast prince becomes the masked leader of the rebellion against an all-powerful empire.

title: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners
description: A Street Kid trying to survive in a technology and body modification-obsessed city of the future. Having everything to lose, he chooses to stay alive by becoming an Edgerunner.

title: Re: Zero, Starting Life in Another World
description: After being suddenly transported to another world, Subaru Natsuki and his new female partner are brutally murdered. However, Subaru awakens to a familiar scene.

title: Berserk
description: Guts, a wandering mercenary, joins the Band of the Hawk after being defeated in a duel by Griffith, the group's leader and founder. Together, they dominate every battle, but something menacing lurks in the shadows.

title: Spy x Family
description: A spy on an undercover mission gets married and adopts a child as part of his cover. His wife and daughter have secrets of their own, and all three must strive to keep together.

title: Dandadan
description: A high school student who believes in aliens teams up with a girl who believes in ghosts to investigate supernatural phenomena.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: The futuristic misadventures and tragedies of an easygoing bounty hunter and his partners.

title: Takopi's Original Sin
description: A dark psychological story about a young girl and an alien octopus who tries to help her find happiness.

title: The Apothecary Diaries
description: A young woman is kidnapped and sold to the imperial palace, where she uses her knowledge of medicine to solve mysteries.

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: With the help of the powerful Dragonballs, a team of fighters led by the saiyan warrior Goku defend the planet earth from extraterrestrial enemies.

title: Steins;Gate
description: After discovering time travel, a university student and his colleagues must use their knowledge of it to stop an evil organization and their diabolical plans.

title: Gintama
description: In an era where aliens have invaded and taken over feudal Tokyo, an unemployed samurai finds work however he can.

title: Pok√©mon
description: Covering the continuing adventures of series protagonist Ash Ketchum and Pikachu, and his best friend Brock, as they travel through different regions.

title: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation
description: A 34-year-old underachiever gets run over by a bus, but his story isn't over. Reincarnated as an infant, he'll embark on an epic adventure.

title: Tokyo Ghoul
description: A college student is transformed into a half-ghoul after an encounter with one, and must learn to survive in both the human and ghoul worlds.

title: Fragrant Flower
description: A story about love and relationships in modern Japan.

title: Dr. Stone
description: Awakened into a world where humanity has been petrified, scientific genius Senku and his brawny friend Taiju use their skills to rebuild civilization.

title: Mob Psycho 100
description: A psychic middle school boy tries to live a normal life and keep his growing powers under control, even though he constantly gets into trouble.

title: Haikyu!!
description: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player nicknamed the small giant, Shoyo joins his school's volleyball club.

title: Kaguya-sama: Love Is War
description: Two geniuses at the top of their class both have feelings for each other, but refuse to confess first. The war of love and pride begins.

title: Violet Evergarden
description: A former child soldier becomes an Auto Memory Doll, writing letters for others while searching for the meaning of love.

title: Erased
description: A 29-year-old manga artist is sent back in time 18 years to prevent events leading to his mother's death, which involves preventing a serial kidnapping.

title: Sword Art Online
description: In the near future, a Virtual Reality Massive Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game called Sword Art Online has been released where players control their avatars with their bodies using a piece of technology called Nerve Gear.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
description: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemical experiment.

title: My Dress-Up Darling
description: A high school boy who loves making Hina dolls meets a girl who wants to become a cosplayer, and they begin working together.

title: The Promised Neverland
description: When three gifted kids at an isolated idyllic orphanage discover the dark truth of the outside world, they seek to escape from their evil caretaker and lead the children in a risky escape plan.

title: Parasyte: The Maxim
description: A high school student's right hand becomes infected by an alien parasite that fails to take over his brain, forcing them to form an uneasy alliance.

title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
description: A 37-year-old Tokyo salaryman is stabbed to death. He is reborn in a world of magic as a slime with special abilities.

title: Gurren Lagann
description: Two friends use a mecha to fight against an oppressive regime in a post-apocalyptic world.

title: The Seven Deadly Sins
description: The story of the Seven Deadly Sins, a group of warriors who were wrongly accused of a crime they didn't commit and went on a quest to vindicate themselves.

title: Dororo
description: A ronin who was born with missing limbs and features because of a demonic pact must reclaim his body parts from 12 demons.

title: Nana
description: Two young women with the same name meet on a train to Tokyo and become roommates, each pursuing their dreams.

title: Classroom of the Elite
description: A high school student hides his true abilities and manipulates events from behind the scenes in an elite school.

title: Chained Soldier
description: A young man becomes a slave to a powerful female commander in a world where gates to another dimension have opened.

title: Devilman Crybaby
description: A timid teenager fuses with a demon to become Devilman, gaining a demon's powers while retaining a human's soul.

title: Serial Experiments Lain
description: A young girl becomes involved with the Wired, a global communications network similar to the internet.

title: Legend of the Galactic Heroes
description: An epic space opera following two military geniuses on opposite sides of an interstellar war.

title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
description: Son of Naruto Uzumaki, Boruto, follows his father's footsteps along with his friends to become great ninja.

title: High School DxD
description: A high school student is killed and resurrected as a devil, joining a devil's peerage and fighting supernatural threats.

title: Fairy Tail
description: Lucy, an aspiring Celestial Wizard, becomes a friend and ally to powerful wizards Natsu, Gray, and Erza, who are part of the wizard guild, Fairy Tail.

title: Mashle: Magic and Muscles
description: In a world where magic is everything, a boy with no magical abilities uses his superhuman strength to compete.

title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai
description: A high school student encounters various girls experiencing supernatural phenomena known as puberty syndrome.
